com.mygdx.game

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • com.mygdx.game.LevelObject
          • com.mygdx.game.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionSubject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Character, Enemy

    public abstract class Entity
extends LevelObject
implements CollisionSubject
    This class includes variables and methods to support the movement of relevant levelObjects

      • Entity

        public Entity(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion img,
              int x,
              int y,
              java.lang.String name,
              com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer collisionLayer)
        Constructor method for an entity which are moving objects
        Parameters:
        x - x-axis co-ordinate of object
        y - y-axis co-ordinate of object
        name - name of the object
        img - Texture of the image
        collisionLayer - layer to observe the entities collisions
